channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Christmas tree and sledge fly tipped, 10th April
item.description:
Christmas tree and sledge fly tipped . I also found a bag of charity collection bags, which I have removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Pease Croft Kidnappers Lane, Cheltenham

item.title: Void opening up in lane, 10th April
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Parcel 0036 Adjacent The Uplands Dog Lane, Witcombe

item.title: Street Light needs dimming, 8th April
item.description:
Street Light outside 1 & 3 Digby Grove shines brightly into bedrooms it is directly outside. Please can a dimmer be attached to the street light as it is causing sleep issues at the properties.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 5 Digby Grove, Brockworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parking obstructing drive entrance, 7th April
item.description:
New flats built backing onto Hereford Place are causing people to park in a way that obstructs the entrance to Hereford Place. There is no way an emergency vehicle could get into the drive as you have to drive over the pavement now to get in to the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 17 Hereford Place, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Highway obstructed by posts in the carriageway surface., 7th April
item.description:
The highway (public road) has been obstructed by posts driven in to the carriageway surface at a gate, obstructing it to all but able-bodied pedestrians. GCC - Please confirm if you have authorised this obstruction or not.

Report on FixMyStreet
